name: Twentype
description:
Just a little typing game. 

 Made for the 20 Second Game Jam in about 12 hours (split between two days).

 Inspirations: Typing games.

Credits

Font used  was the Open Dyslexic. Palette used was Sweetie-16. Words generated here.

Software used:

  • Godot Engine v4.0 Beta 4;
  • LabChirp v1.60;
  • Screen To Gif 2.31;
  • GIMP v2.10.32.
